verbose_text: Spebrutinib inhibited B-cell proliferation with an IC 50 of 0.7 muM; reduced expression of activation markers CD86, CD40, CD54, and CD69; and inhibited IL-6 production.
evidence: Spebrutinib inhibited B-cell proliferation with an IC 50  of 0.7 muM; reduced expression of activation markers CD86, CD40, CD54, and CD69; and inhibited IL-6
